about_the_game:
ABOUT THIS GAME

In 07GORILLAS , Players will face an endless onslaught of infected and deal with potential emergencies, utilizing tactical enhancements and tactical consumables and a diverse array of kung fu to try and clear the area of infecter in 20 minutes. Successful completion of the mission depends on your decision-making under various pressures. Question is, will you make it?

Key Features

  • Powerful Kung Fu: Division Slug has prepared more than 30 types of Kung Fu for the squad with a wide range of performance and distinctive features.
  • Tactical Consumables: The geeky engineers at Division Slug R&D provides a lot of tactical consumables for GORILLAS, these things work better than they look.
  • internal force Enhancement: The geeky engineers at Division Slug R&D provides a lot of internal forceenhancement that will affect the performance of Kung Fu and GORILLAS.
  • Diffrent Gorilla Ability: Seven gorillas has unique abilities and attributes.
  • Precise Control: Directional aim and active firing delivers a methodical battle system.
  • Interchangeable Kung Fu: In this game, you can change kung fu through supplies to experience more diverse battles.
  • Special Events: A series of odd and dangerous situations can occur at any time in the area, and the player will need to take advantage of them by responding to warnings and making decisions in real time to turn a disadvantage into an advantage while being surrounded by a variety of infecters.
  • Pick Up And Play: 10-20 minute runs built with quick play sessions.

short_description: 07GORILLAS is a top-down roguelike arena shooter game, you control one gorilla from a squad of seven break into "Foggy Zone" on a cleanup mission. Missions lasts less than 20 minutes, fight your way with powerful kung fu and tactical consumables, don't foget internal force enhancement.
